item.title: With a server?
item.dc:creator: @grimreaper61 grimreaper61
item.description:
@grimreaper61 wrote:

ok how many questions is this lol. what do you mean red/orange/blue/green? and why are you talking about winrar lol. I will show you the format for autospawn.cfg and item.cfg. Here is the autospawnspawn = 2263 3017 4824 0 3021 4828 2975 4820 1 spawn = (npcid)(tab)(XXXX)(tab)(YYYY)(tab)(height)(tab)(walkcoordx)(tab)(walkcoordy)(tab)(walk2coordx)(tab)(walk2coordy)(tab)(whether it walks or stays still)
For the walking coords and height leave 0 since you are just starting. And make the last number 0 so it wont walk around.
The item.cfg is just as easyitem = 13643 Statius_warhammer Its_a_big_ass_hammer 500000000 500000000 500000000 135 135 135 0 135 0 0 0 0 0 135 40 item = (itemid)(tab)(item name)(tab)(examineinfo)(tab)(price1)(tab)(price2)(tab)(price3)(tab)(stab)(tab)(slash)(tab)(crush)(tab)(magic)(tab)(range)(tab)(stabdef)(tab)(slashdef)(tab)(crushdef)(tab)(magedef)(tab)(rangedef)(tab)(strbonus)(tab)(praybonus)
thats for a custom so wont be much use to you but that is the format for them both. Hope you can understand it

Read full topic
